translations: v．参与，分享，共享：参加某事或与他人分享某物。
· She was partaking in the celebration.

sentences.sentence: They were partaking of our simple meal.
sentences.translation: 他们跟我们一起吃便饭。

sentences.sentence: It is partaking of precisely the same activity.
Without partaking of each, no one can call himself a complete man.
sentences.translation: 没有参与到每一个，任何人都不是完整的。
